Content: 6*n34507a0616*section banswer all questions in the spaces provided.5 a student is asked to determine the resistivity of iron using a length of iron wire. describe an experiment which could be carried out to achieve this. include  a statement of the measurements to be taken,  a list of the apparatus required,  a diagram of the apparatus,  an explanation of how the measurements will be used to determine the resistivity,  one precaution the student should take to improve the accuracy of the result.(7)(total for question 5 = 7 marks)
